![A project badge featuring the A11Y logo and the text "Built for Accessibility"](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built_for_Accessibility-_.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoWidth=28&colorA=20c997&colorB=343a40&style=flat)

# A11Y Logo
A community logo for web accessibility. If you'd like to, use it! If not, that's neat.

Released under the [CC0 License](./LICENSE), this logo is in the public domain. No attribution is required (although we wouldn't complain if you'd like to link back here ðŸ˜‰)

Feel free to offer your own alternative on Twitter using [#a11ylogo](https://twitter.com/search?q=a11ylogo)!

![Accessibility Logo, spelling out "a, one, one, y" in dark grey, surrounded by a teal box](logo.svg)

## Badge
![A project badge featuring the A11Y logo and the text "Built for Accessibility"](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built_for_Accessibility-_.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoWidth=28&colorA=20c997&colorB=343a40&style=flat)

If you'd like to show your project's support for accessibility, feel free to include this badge in your README by copying and pasting the code below.
```md
![A project badge featuring the A11Y logo and the text "Built for Accessibility"](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built_for_Accessibility-_.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoWidth=28&colorA=20c997&colorB=343a40&style=flat)
```

## Thanks to 
- [shields.io](https://shields.io/) for serving up the badge image
- [logo.js](https://github.com/voodootikigod/logo.js) for inspiration
- [open-color](https://github.com/yeun/open-color) for color values

- [Accessibility Logo](http://staff.washington.edu/tft/a11ylogo/)
